dnsRefreshRate.description: DNSRefreshRate specifies the rate at which DNS records should be refreshed. Defaults to 30 seconds.

respectDnsTtl.description: RespectDNSTTL indicates whether the DNS Time-To-Live (TTL) should be respected. If the value is set to true, the DNS refresh rate will be set to the resource recordâ€™s TTL. Defaults to true.
